documents.document: It's hard to leave a job when next person changes everything & makes mess.Obama's a much better person than me.Must be so hard to step away
Was just a little bit looking forward to a cuppa and some @BLACKCAPS action during toddler naptime...#rainraingoaway
Guess school's back. My FB feed is full of photos of school children #bless #thisold
@nzpost unfortunately not what I was told late last year. Seems there may be some confusion....
@nzpost so this means only within same city? 'You can change your delivery address to another location, while your parcel is on its way'
@seekjobsnz thank you youre helping with my feelings of despondency!
@seekjobsnz wow what a cool job...think I could invent wine and beer experience...!?
@seekjobsnz marketing role in Queenstown. Pref Mktg Mgr #hensteeth
@seekjobsnz I wish you had 'tell us how amazing you are in Twitter characters & we'll find a job for you' #queenstowndreaming
Lost to today's wind sanity, humour and my toddlers hat....the hat could be in Auckland by now I'm sure my sanity and humour will return
It's a day ending in day and it's windy...must be summer. That's how low expectations are!
@rawsoncj @Geekpulp I agree. What were you thinking seriously...!?
Anyone out there looking for a great NZ experience w ample fresh air do the #otagorailtrail Hurts the bottom but so worth it #nearlyhalfway
Wow now 7 working days 13 days and still no update on my 'courier'. Thanks @nzpost your service is quite special even at this time of year
Thanks to all the patient, courteous drivers between Feilding & Alexandra since Weds. Restored my faith in driving #windyroads #allsafe
I'm trying to be calm and xmassie but seriously 6 days for a courier within N Island. 2 days for 20kms & still no sign #busytimes
@KalistaCampbell wow that is so cool #yayyou
Was too excited about throwing my new nerf during dinner to photograph sorry tweeps. Thank you #nzsecretsanta & the choccies
@KylieBrooks81 it's all about the giving at this time of year....hee hee
There are still many many good people in this world and esp NZ. #nzsecretsanta is proof
I wish the #nzaa were on Twitter then I could implore them to be Christmasy and grant me a new member wish #goodcheer
The suspense of waiting for receiver to get their #nzsecretsanta while waiting to not be home alone to open mine https://t.co/L0Uav3RD7Y
Amateur mistake hubby. Didn't log out of @TradeMe so now I can see what auctions he's been watching #pressies
This high school yearbook blackmail is disgusting. Son finished school,no exams,signed out early to start fulltime job no yearbook for you
@KalistaCampbell I hear you last time I tried the wheels were quicker than I remember and I broke my elbow #ouch
Good turn done for the day. Found a discarded wallet under some bushes on way to Santa cave. Handed in to the @nzpolice to reunite
How am I supposed to pay for using the tauranga toll road when the online system to pay it is down....@NZTA? #timesticking
Oh I can't wait to get my gift wrapping done all saucy like by the Loins #badtypo #PNPlaza https://t.co/bCfvlHucxu
Go the @BLACKCAPS sadly I favour sleep right now but I'm hoping to wake to a lovely win #summersport #ausvnz #chappellhadlee
@eloquentsonia @KylieBrooks81 28 pages for a Saturday paper is tragic #whybother
How hard is it to work out we get a @DomPost not a @ManawatuNZ Oh well it'll only take 5 minutes to read the whole paper
Better stop procrastinating and get movin on my @nzsecretsanta #goodelf
Hope you've had a terrific day today @KalistaCampbell #HB2U #hiphiphurray
Right off I go for a peaceful shake and rattle free night...and a little Miss who again sleeps until 8am #fingerscrossed #tiredhouse
That's the 1st one I've felt today. It's really not fun when you're home alone with a sleeping bubba #eqnz #nervesshot #noisydoors
@Geekpulp @KalistaCampbell I just hope those near the centre are okay. Josh and I still I see the doors!!
@KalistaCampbell @Geekpulp awake too the Young family!?
@KalistaCampbell nice to see someone else freaking out...we're all awake except for Sienna
Would the earth please stop moving now. Starting to feel like vertigo #eqnz #shaky
15 mins of stand up instead of 7 days @JeremyCorbett He's doing ok there's laughter in the room #nailingpalmy https://t.co/j86Gd4SEof
Rocking the #manawatubusinessawards tonight. Adding some colour to proceedings of I may say so https://t.co/FywoNpAKuT
Iâ€™ve just signed up for awesomeness at #nzsecretsanta. Love it!! https://t.co/m2Ywr4RUat
This is very frightening....#electionnight Surely it's only the early counts favouring Trump...Surely...please no
Here you go @rawsoncj ðŸ˜Š https://t.co/gim74buTjC
@rawsoncj I trust you voted then...
How are you feeling @sarjanehughes? #nervous #excited It's a big day!!
Checked with fam whether I'm too precious but apparently not...no need for @skysportnz to advertise UFC during ABs game #enoughviolence
@rachoconnor probably when you move somewhere more tropical....lovely in feilding!!
It's only when travelling on other unnamed airlines that you realise it's the little things that make @FlyAirNZ so good #nexttime
#1stworld #mummaproblems what to do when another child not only blatantly pushes your child over in a pool but also her friend? #youngbully
@AllBlacks wish we'd been able to watch last ABvAUS game online....Oh well never mind #overitnow
I've voted for #Perenara in the IRPA Try of the Year award 2016 https://t.co/71t2iPtwTu
Been hanging out for dessert all week in KL so thought a milo roti would do the trick #whenindoas #localfood
@HamishMacaulay they look horrendous!!
@LydiaKo crazy hot here as a tourist let alone playing sport! Good luck out there!!
If they say they're genuine Gucci baby shoes who I am to disbelieve #kualalumpur #markets #shopping
Nothing beats the giggles from Miss 19months as we fed ostriches in ridiculous heat today at #kualalumpurs bird park #heartsmelting
@KylieBrooks81 on no. That sounds grotty
Gutted having to 'watch' @allblacks via twitter from Malaysia Cant find an online watch to save myself #loyal
Wow @ANZ_NZ you could have not been more unhelpful. 5 days to get foreign currency 200km up the road. You underwhelm me #poor
Do I really have to wait up until 10pm tonight to watch the @SilverFernsNZ in action!? #bedtime
@MAS is it possible to take our hopefully sleeping toddler in her buggy all the way to the gate? Travelling AKL to KL #thanks
@RyanLSimpson @OtagoRugbyTeam @sumostevenson I assumed they were trialling the new concussion testing technology....?
It's also a shame that schools are driven by credits not getting kids into the right option for them #biggerpicture @NigelLatta
Loving the thought provoking programme tonight @NigelLatta Plenty for young people to think about, shame they wont be watching... #apathy
@AirNZFairy @WetaWorkshop oh man am I too late?! My husband is a major fan I would be upgraded to amazing side status of I took him to this
@vodafoneNZ how much are the Fuji prints in the app featured in today's email? #thanks
Safe to say we'll have crackling tonight after little Missy turned the oven to 260 fan grill #whatsthesmell
So if @juliansavea7 is on 43 tries now who is ahead of him? Any chance the commentators can tell us @skysportnz @AllBlacks
@FlyBuysNZ I'd love to but I'm not getting that option...
Sounds a bit sap but I loved your #cue top tonight @ToniStreet Could I rock it around home with Miss Toddler tho #grubbyhands
Day old tiramisu cake. Come to me!! #yummygoodness #healthkick #domesticgoddess https://t.co/U7fBnJxe7q
Good 1 @FlyBuysNZ. I travel 20km to pick up my reward to be told it's out of stock. Great experience...
Much much better post match @skysportnz Entertaining & actually funny. Thanks @JamesMcOnie @sumostevenson
Bring it on!! Let's go @AllBlacks #gametime #wine #snacks https://t.co/s4Gj87q9cO
There's many who think they're seriously under-funded but I suspect @jono_naylor you're missing a 'm' #typo #funny https://t.co/SuLanJAUl7
Sewing the perfect pastime in which to be strong while willing my toddler to nap #mammamamma #notgoingsowell
@TwoPaddocks trying to find your blog & getting an error 'your connection is not private attackers might be trying to steal your info' #bad
So I'm fairly sure they mean the book not the person...@dancarter https://t.co/hFgUFKj1LM
@CasBMCarter the amusement is those who proclaim to be action oriented. It's council so very unlikely!!
It's past my bedtime so I really hope staying up to yell at the tv is worth it tonight #sleepy #AUSvNZL #allblacks
@TwoPaddocks such a great episode. Love Saturday night CC. Can't wait to partake of some product at Xmas after doing the mighty Rail Trail
The ecstatic joy from watching the new @SparkNZ twinkle twinkle tv ad #lovesit #simplethings https://t.co/BMczMbGaIF
Going to watch the triumphant @BlackSticks quarter final. So much easier when I know the result #victorious #Rio2016
And again today @NZStuffEditors trying to read Olympics news and getting access denied. I'm off to @nzherald you're rubbish
I give up on the news for tonight. Every link I click takes me to a 404 page @NZStuff @NZStuffEditors
So gutted for the men's @BlackSticks Did us proud though @Rio2016 #robbed
Wow it makes you proud of all the kiwi Olympic athletes but seriously how amazing are the @kiwipair Years of hard work, such legends
I feel all warm and fuzzy about Fiji winning the #7s #Rio2016
Dear Council candidates, stop humouring us by using words like action and energy...you're running for council #noaction
@seekjobsnz do you think some advertisers ignore appns using the apply button if there's wording to say contact blah by email?#noreply
Pushing the buggy walking the dog drinking coffee trying to catch updates of the #Rio2016 #7s final
I swear Aussie sportsgirls get lessons in making their hair pretty and the use of ribbons #Rio2016
@brgibson11 @MorePho you'll need to in tonight definitely #5degrees
@eloquentsonia it's disgusting and totally disrespectful
@eloquentsonia totally agree. Elder abuse is akin to child abuse in my book
Love it when they say how long your overseas delivery will be then you hear the box hitting front door step over a week early #wearingthem
Congrats on a great 1st season with the @Highlanders @greg_pleasants You haven't converted your uncle yet...who knows for next season!
@Highlanders so exciting. Not so exciting to make me lose sleep but that's why we have #mysky #getup #loyal
And for today, thank you my timing was impeccable #watchingrain #torrential https://t.co/lRnBAc0na2
